body.name: YJ.GWL Soft Shag Geometric Area Rug for Girls Bedroom, 4x6 Feet Green Cozy Modern Indoor Memory Foam Carpet, Washable Fluffy Rugs for Living Room Kids Nursery Dorm Christmas Decor Floor Mat
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 16 mins
features: Stylish Unique Design: This modern geometric shaggy rug is designed with a gray plush pile and white plush lantern pattern in a symmetrical and rational and geometric pattern that adds a sense of style and sophistication to your room and makes your home stand out

Premium Quality: Our luxury bedroom rug is made of three layers of material: the top is a high-density microfiber pile that is soft and cozy to the touch, the middle sandwich has thickened memory foam to provide some extra cushioning for your feet, and the back is designed with non-slip dots to keep the rug stationary on the floor

Versatile: The plush thick memory foam rug is suitable for any area of your home, such as: living room, bedroom, bedside, children's room, nursery, playroom, apartment dormitory, den, home office, dining room and pet resting mat. It can also be used as a housewarming and Christmas gift, it is indeed nice and stylish home decoration and ideal gift

Easy To Clean: The surface of the kid's rug is made of a safe and stain-resistant short pile that is very easy to clean, shake the fuzzy rug and use a vacuum cleaner for daily cleaning. For a deeper clean, simply machine wash gently in cold water or spot wipe and air dry

Before-Use Tips: For ease of shipping, our fluffy living room rugs are vacuum sealed, which may cause it to arrive looking thinner than expected and may have creases. But please don't worry, simply shake the carpet and lay it flat and it will return to its normal thickness and fluffiness within 2-3 days. We recommend using a dryer to remove rug creases more quickly

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YJ.GWL Shag Area Rug, Ideal for Your Home Life

Details About The Memory Foam Geometric Rugs Ultra-Soft Rug The surface of the shag carpet is a soft velvet material, which is very comfortable to the touch. Thick Memory Foam 0.5 inches memory foam interlayer is not only given a soft feeling but also keep your feet from the cold floor, help reduce noise from walking. Non-slip Backing Rug Thousands of tiny, durable PVC dots will help to prevent the carpet from sliding around on your floors. No Shedding Rug
Previous page Next page 1 Rug for Living Room 2 Rug for Bedroom 3 Rug for Kids Room 4 Rug for Playroom 5 Rug for Nursery Room

Soft, Shaggy, Thick, Cozy, and Beautiful Pattern The geometric memory foam rug, with its beautiful pattern and soft thickness, feels very comfortable whether you walk on it or lie on it. Friendly tips: 1. The shag rug is vacuum packed, it will not be so thick when you just open it, please give the carpet 1-2 days to let it recover fluffy. Perfect Gift for Christmas or Housewarming Every family needs a good carpet that is so comfortable and beautiful. YJ.GWL brand will be your trustworthy and good partner in home decoration.

How to make creases disappear? Washing machine cleaning is the easiest and most effective way to remove creases, plus you can eliminate creases in these ways:1. Reverse roll the rug, let it sit for a day or two; 2. Flatten the rug by applying weight. Is the size of the rug accurate? Because of the folded and compressed packaging, the size of rug may be smaller than described when you first open it, but the rug becomes fluffy and thicker, and the size will also become bigger. Is the rug non-slip? Our carpets can prevent carpet sliding to a certain extent, but the anti-slip effect varies depending on the flooring material. Wooden flooring is less anti-slip and tile flooring is the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is a great size, good quality, and SO SOFT. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and the pattern. It is extremely soft which can make it harder than others to clean, but it hasn’t been that much of a hassle for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got the grey and white rug. It was shrink wrapped and when I released it from the bag and put it on the floor, I wasn't sure all of the wrinkles and lines would ever come out. It was also a few inches shorter than advertised. But after 24 hours of being on the floor, it smoothed out and got longer. I love it! It is very soft. I wouldn't say its shag, not the traditional shag from the 80's but that doesn't take away from it. My dog of course had to claim it and she piddled a tiny bit on it. I just used some enzyme spray and it cleaned up nicely. It says it can be machine washed, but I will most likely not do that because of it's size. I'll spot clean and/or use my deep cleaning vacuum.This rug would be best in a bedroom due to how soft it is. I wouldn't put it in a high traffic area because I feel its meant for bare feet and would be a great rug for children to play on. For the price of under $45, it can't be beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How did they make this so soft
reviews.reviewText: I was VERY surprised by this rug. So soft, so comfortable. It lays completely flat with no rolling sides. It looks better in person than in pictures. I can't comment on it's wash ability, but it seems to have the right backing that won't get messed up over time. I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rug looks good to me and it is nice and soft. The backing it has seems to keep it in place real good. I did leave something heavy on the corners for a few lays so it would lay flatter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars nice and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: very soft and the gray color is very subtle and quiet. it has just the right amount of fluff to make it feel good in between the toes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s really hard to clean I tried to clean it manny ways the dirt just does not come out
reviews.reviewText: This carpet is so hard to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and thick
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice rug. It brings a little style and elegance to any living space. It has a layer of memory foam and adequate material that makes it super soft. This does add a challenge to vacuuming it but nothing to difficult. Just may a few extra passes with the vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It looks great
reviews.reviewText: This is a great area rug. I like the pattern. It looks very nice in my room. It has a nice soft feel when you walk on it. It’s a great size and fits very well in many places. When it arrived, it was all packaged very tightly in a tight little bundle. When I laid it out on the floor, it had all kinds of creases and bubbles sticking up. But, after a few days, it all laid out very nicely, and looks beautiful. For the money, this is a great rug. If you are a person who likes to sit on the floor, this rug isn’t very thick, so you might want to buy a pad or something to put underneath it. Other than that it works great.
